message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd find it valuable. I'm offering it to you for $200. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $120 for it. Please let me know if this is within your range.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your perspective on the value. However, $120 is quite a bit below what I'm hoping for.  Could you meet me halfway at $160?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I appreciate your position on the matter. I am willing to go up to $140 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
